Summary: Emitted a Green/Red Underside. Moved from 1end of the sky to another almost instantly.
divs: sighting detailsi was riding in my nissan frontier w\ my gf back from work and we were looking south towards mexio. we were at the (los tomates) check point and to our amazement this green underbellied object that had a disc form went from one side of the sky to another almost instantly. then it just vanished without a trace.i was a bit frightened about it and my gf was a really scared at the time. we went straight home after we saw that and talked about it. it was something not of this world alright.
